Nci.NCI_SQL: alter table T_JFW_DATAMODEL add(INST varchar2(20),BEHAVIOR varchar2(200))
alter table T_JFW_FIELDINFO add(UNIT varchar2(64),IS_MAIN number(4))
alter table T_JFW_FUNCTION add(IPCONTROL number(4),IPPOLICYID varchar2(64))

create table JFW_OWAY_BEHAVIOR(SEQKEY VARCHAR2(64) NOT NULL primary key, CLAZZ VARCHAR2(64), URL VARCHAR2(500), NAME VARCHAR2(100), DESCRIPTION VARCHAR2(200), GROUP_NAME VARCHAR2(200), DISPLAYORDER NUMBER(4), CONDITION VARCHAR2(500), GROUP_ID VARCHAR2(64), CREATEID VARCHAR2(64), CREATEDATEDATE, UPDATEID VARCHAR2(64), UPDATEDATE DATE, USER_ORGID VARCHAR2(64), USER_UNITID VARCHAR2(64), URL_OR_JS NUMBER(4))

create table JFW_BASE_CUSTOMCONFIG(SEQKEY VARCHAR2(32) NOT NULL primary key, MODULENAME VARCHAR2(50), MODELNAME VARCHAR2(50), USERID VARCHAR2(50), ORDERBY_FIELD VARCHAR2(50), ORDERBY_MODE NUMBER(4), SUMMARY_STYLE VARCHAR2(20), DISPLAY_ROWS NUMBER(4), CREATEID VARCHAR2(32), CREATEDATE DATE, UPDATEID VARCHAR2(32), UPDATEDATE DATE, USER_ORGID VARCHAR2(32), USER_UNITID VARCHAR2(32), CONDITION_FIELDS VARCHAR2(200))

create table JFW_BASE_CUSTOMFIELD(SEQKEY VARCHAR2(32) NOT NULL primary key, CUSTOMDEFINEID VARCHAR2(32), FIELDNAME VARCHAR2(50), DISPLAY_ORDER NUMBER(4), SEARCHFLAG NUMBER(4), DISPLAY_FORMAT VARCHAR2(50), CREATEID VARCHAR2(32), CREATEDATE DATE, UPDATEID VARCHAR2(32), UPDATEDATE DATE, USER_ORGID VARCHAR2(32), USER_UNITID VARCHAR2(32), ALIGNMENT NUMBER(4), DISPLAY_WIDTH NUMBER(10), MODELNAME VARCHAR2(200), DISPLAYNAME VARCHAR2(100))

create table JFW_BASE_CUSTOMORDER(SEQKEY VARCHAR2(64) NOT NULL primary key, CUSTOMDEFINEID VARCHAR2(64), FIELDNAME VARCHAR2(100), DISPLAYNAME VARCHAR2(100), ASC_DESC VARCHAR2(64), DISPLAY_ORDER NUMBER(4), MODELNAME VARCHAR2(64))
